title: Catalytic conversion of carbon dioxide (CO2) using coal-based nano-carbon materials
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27298-27309
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03407D, Review Article

Hongchao Luo, Xinjuan Liu
Coal-based carbon materials (CCMs) can function as either standalone catalysts or as components of composite catalysts, making them promising materials for CO2 reduction.
